alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clay County through 400 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doctors Inlet, or near Middleburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Middleburg, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, Camp Blanding, Penney Farms and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
